mapper.select: select from TSSO_USER ORDER by USER_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(USER_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(USER_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TSSO_USER
select * from TSSO_USER where USER_ORDER_NUM = (select max(USER_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_USER where USER_ORDER_NUM<(select USER_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_USER where USER_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TSSO_USER where USER_ORDER_NUM = (select min(USER_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_USER where USER_ORDER_NUM>(select USER_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_USER where USER_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select from TSSO_USER where USER_ID in (select BIND_USER_ID from TSSO_USER_ROLE where BIND_ROLE_ID=#{roleId})
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_ACCOUNT from TSSO_USER where USER_STATUS='启用'
